title: Slayer task/Fossil Island wyverns

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fossil Island Wyverns are a Slayer Monster requiring 66 Slayer to kill, 60 Combat, as well as the completion of the quests Elemental Workshop and Bone Voyage to be assigned as a slayer task.

content:
Fossil Island Wyverns
Requirements
Skills 66
Combat level 60
OtherCompletion of Bone Voyage
Task Amounts
Konar15-30 (55-75)
Nieve20-60 (55-75)
Duradel20-60 (55-75)
Advanced data
Icon ID21507

Fossil Island Wyverns are a Slayer Monster requiring 66 Slayer to kill, 60 Combat, as well as the completion of the quests Elemental Workshop and Bone Voyage to be assigned as a slayer task.

Wyverns often use the icy breath attack dealing large damage and reducing stats if a protective shield is not equipped. An Elemental Shield, Mind Shield, Dragonfire Shield, Dragonfire Ward, or Ancient Wyvern Shield must be equipped in order to fight them.

The Anti-dragon shield, Protect from Magic prayer, and antifire potions CAN NOT be used as a substitute for the shields. As such, using two-handed weapons such as the Toxic Blowpipe or Abyssal Bludgeon is highly discouraged.

Despite offering protection from the icy breath effect, only the Ancient wyvern shield provides complete protection, preventing the accompanying freeze effect, which prevents attacking and movement. The Elemental Shield, Mind Shield, Dragonfire Shield, Dragonfire Ward will only prevent the damage and stat reductions.

Wyverns may drop Fossil Island fossils of various sizes. Both caves have a Fossil Storage box by their respective entrances.

Contents

  • 1 Shield Comparison
  • 2 Slayer Unlocks
  • 3 Monster Variants
  • 4 Location Comparison

Shield Comparison[edit | edit source]

Icon Shield Name Prevents Damage Prevents Stat Drain Prevents Freeze Notes
Anti-dragon shield No No No
Elemental or Mind shield Yes Yes No Obtained during Elemental Workshop I and II.
Dragonfire shield Yes Yes No Requires 90 , an Anti-dragon shield, and a Draconic visage to create.
Dragonfire ward Yes Yes No Requires 90 , an Anti-dragon shield, and a Skeletal visage to create.
Ancient wyvern shield Yes Yes Yes Requires 66 , 66 , an Elemental shield, and a Wyvern visage to create.

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
Stop the Wyvern 500 This Unlock allows you to block fossil island wyverns without it counting towards your block list, albeit much more expensive than using a block list slot in terms of slayer points used.
Wyver-nother two 100 The extension unlock for fossil island wyverns, which brings all tasks amounts up to a range of 55-75 assigned per task.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat Level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Spitting Wyvern 139 205
  • Wyvern Cave
  • Task-Only Wyvern cave
 Attacks with melee, ranged, and Icy breath, but seeing as the ranged attack is not typeless and can be prayed against, it makes it more favorable to kill over taloned wyverns, and deal relatively lower damage with slightly better drops.
Taloned Wyvern 147 205
  • Wyvern Cave
  • Task-Only Wyvern cave
 Attacks with melee, typeless ranged, and ice breath, making it the least favorable of the wyverns to kill.
Long-tailed Wyvern 152 205
  • Wyvern Cave
  • Task-Only Wyvern cave
 Attack with only melee and Ice breath, so it is recommended to either range with an Ancient wyvern shield or melee with protect from melee active.
Ancient Wyvern 210 315
  • Wyvern Cave
  • Task-Only Wyvern cave
 The Ancient Wyvern resembles the Long-tailed wyvern, but seems to be a stronger variant, requiring 82 slayer to kill, although it can only be killed on a fossil island wyvern slayer task.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Wyvern Cave,

east of Museum Camp

  • 4 Spitting Wyvern
  • 4 Taloned Wyvern
  • 4 Long-tailed Wyvern
  • 2 Ancient Wyvern
 No No No
Task-only Wyvern Cave,

inside the Mushroom Forest

  • 4 Spitting Wyvern
  • 4 Taloned Wyvern
  • 4 Long-tailed Wyvern
  • 3 Ancient Wyvern
 No No No
  • Only killable when assigned a Fossil Island Wyverns slayer task

Fossil Island Wyverns are a [[Slayer monsters|Slayer Monster]] requiring 66 Slayer to kill, 60 Combat, as well as the completion of the quests [[Elemental Workshop I|Elemental Workshop]] and [[Bone Voyage]] to be assigned as a [[slayer task]]. 

Wyverns often use the [[icy breath]] attack dealing large damage and reducing stats if a protective shield is not equipped.
An [[Elemental shield|Elemental Shield]], [[Mind shield|Mind Shield]], [[Dragonfire shield|Dragonfire Shield]], [[Dragonfire ward|Dragonfire Ward]], or [[Ancient wyvern shield|Ancient Wyvern Shield]] must be equipped in order to fight them. 

The [[Anti-dragon shield]], [[Protect from Magic]] prayer, and [[antifire potion]]s CAN NOT be used as a substitute for the shields. As such, using two-handed weapons such as the [[Toxic blowpipe|Toxic Blowpipe]] or [[Abyssal bludgeon|Abyssal Bludgeon]] is highly discouraged.

Despite offering protection from the [[icy breath]] effect, only the [[Ancient wyvern shield]] provides complete protection, preventing the accompanying freeze effect, which prevents attacking and movement. 
The [[Elemental shield|Elemental Shield]], [[Mind shield|Mind Shield]], [[Dragonfire shield|Dragonfire Shield]], [[Dragonfire ward|Dragonfire Ward]] will only prevent the damage and stat reductions.

Wyverns may drop [[Fossil Island fossil]]s of various sizes. Both caves have a [[Fossil Storage]] box by their respective entrances.
